mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO userNo , USER_ID userId , USER_PWD userPwd , USER_NAME userName , PHONE , EMAIL , BIRTH_DATE birthDate , JOIN_DATE joinDate FROM TB_CAFE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PWD = #{userPwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CAFE (USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, BIRTH_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_CAFE_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birthDate})
